law.catch_line: In consultation with the Chancellor and after a thorough search, the Board of Regents shall appoint ...

text.section: In consultation with the Chancellor and after a thorough search, the Board of Regents shall appoint a qualified person as president of each constituent institution.
The president of each constituent institution is entitled to the compensation established by the Board of Regents.
The president of each constituent institution serves at the pleasure of the Board of Regents.

The president of each constituent institution shall:
Serve as the chief executive officer of the institution;
Be responsible and accountable to the Board for the discipline and successful conduct of the institution and supervision of each of its departments; and
Take every initiative in:
Implementing the policies of the Board and the constituent institution; and
Promoting the institution's development and efficiency.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (3) of this subsection, each report submitted under paragraph (1) of this subsection shall include the comments of the appropriate board on the institution's progress toward meeting its goals consistent with its mission.
The institutional boards of visitors are encouraged to meet periodically with the Chancellor and Board of Regents to develop close working relationships.

text.section: Subsection (e)(5) of this section may not be construed to require any additional State General Fund support.
